content: We are kicking off a new two-week sprint this afternoon. How does the top of the "sprint ready" column look to you? The most important items have been placed at the top and we will be dragging them into the "this sprint" column. Are there other items that should be near the top? Please see https://github.com/orgs/IQSS/projects/34/views/28 (the "sprint planning" view).
Refactor the OAI code, Step 2 (currently the one before the last) has been planned for 6.1, then 6.2 and 6.3... It would be best if it makes it to the sprint and is not postponed again :)
"This is a big, elephant-sized issue." :sweat_smile: :elephant:
